samples.detailed_notes: Winter conditions with snow coverage throughout. The parking lot appears largely empty with clear visibility. Snow may obscure some parking space markings but does not significantly impair vehicle detection. The aerial perspective provides good coverage of the parking area.

samples.detailed_notes: This appears to be a completely empty truck parking lot with diagonal parking spaces. The lot shows clear tire tracks and wear patterns in the dirt/gravel surface. The parking spaces appear to be designed for large vehicles/trucks based on their size and diagonal configuration. The 'FIXED VIEW' text overlay suggests this is from a stationary monitoring camera.

samples.detailed_notes: This appears to be a truck stop under construction or renovation. The parking lot has clearly marked spaces but is mostly empty. The wet pavement suggests recent rain, creating reflective surfaces. Mountains are visible in the background. The camera position shows approximately 25 parking spaces designed for semi-trucks based on their size and layout.

Camera labeled 'I-87 NB 6 Ardsley SA Truck Pk 2'. Clear winter conditions with snow on ground but roads/parking areas cleared. All vehicles clearly distinguishable. No bobtails detected - all trucks have trailers attached. One passenger vehicle among the trucks. Strong shadows indicate mid-day sun.
